name: Chapter 1 - The Letter ✉️
description:
Chapter I

The Letter ✉️

Penelope sits on the couch like every evening and watches her favorite TV Show on Pengflix. It rings on the door. Unaware that this moment will forever change her life. She opens the front door. Strange, there is nobody there. She looks down at her feet. In front of her is a brown book, a hand written note besides it. She reads her name in delicate handwriting.

That's impossible!

Penelope rushes excitedly into the kitchen and hastily rummages through the drawers. Here he is. Viktors's farewell letter.

She compares the manuscripts.

How can that be?

She has not heard from her brother for more than 14 years ...

With trembling hands she opens the book.
